item.description: Hello, I’m Josh from New Zealand. Most of my public projects can be found below: ransomwatch - the open ransomware claim tracker transl8 - a query builder for searching across Censys, Shodan and 10 others bebop - a framework for de-anonymising Tor and reverse proxy hosts. multisocks - a scaling relay overlay for tor connectivity securitytools - a curated set of projects for security investigators kerchow - the swiss army-knife terminal extension set urlgen - a search engine overlay to expedite OSINT investigations honeypots - a handful of frontends to commonly abused services statuspage - the underground statuspage you can find me on x & github or by mailing josh@atdotcomdotcomdot.
